body:
Hi,



I am working on an office room to collect its light maps. After I collect the lightmaps, I will visualize in Immersive Virtual Environment.  With that in mind, I want to create a sequenced video of lightmaps, but I have encountered a problem doing this. 

The problem: I have created two office rooms, the first one I imported from Revit to 3ds Max and then to Rhino. In this room when I run the grasshopper files all my result values come back 0.00 (Illuminance map generator Grid Analysis.gh). In this case, I am assuming that Honeybee does not recognize the window. Due to that, I have created a box representing the room and drawing a surface to generate the window. In this case, all my results values are around 15100 (LightMapGenarator.gh), which I assumed that is not recognizing any of the geometry. 

The model is available here: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/fwt3545g70tvn3v/InfoVis_Experiment_Model_...](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fwt3545g70tvn3v/InfoVis_Experiment_Model_PreComputed_Scaled_Box.3dm?dl=0)

I have tried to setup the materials and the geometries with different honeybee components with no success. I am sure it is a simple mistake, but I am new to grasshopper and honeybee and could not figure out. 

After that I will have to export the lightmap to a different software, so my question is how I can render only the light map.

Thanks for the help in advance,

Best,

JP



[https://www.dropbox.com/s/fwt3545g70tvn3v/InfoVis_Experiment_Model_...](https://www.dropbox.com/s/fwt3545g70tvn3v/InfoVis_Experiment_Model_PreComputed_Scaled_Box.3dm?dl=0)
topic: My room is not recognizing windows or the walls
